001package org.consensusj.jsonrpc;
002
003/**
004 * In the future this may be a superclass for {@link JsonRpcRequest} and {@link JsonRpcResponse}.
005 * For now it just contains the {@code Version enum}.
006 */
007public class JsonRpcMessage {
008    public enum Version {
009        V1("1.0"),
010        V2("2.0");
011
012        private final String jsonrpc;
013
014        /**
015         * Constructor with value for the {@code jsonrpc} message field.
016         *
017         * @param jsonrpc The value of the {@code jsonrpc} field in a JSON-RPC message
018         */
019        Version(String jsonrpc) {
020            this.jsonrpc = jsonrpc;
021        }
022
023        /**
024         * Get the value for the message field.
025         *
026         * @return the value for the {@code jsonrpc} message field
027         */
028        public String jsonrpc() {
029            return jsonrpc;
030        }
031
032        public String toString() {
033            return jsonrpc;
034        }
035    }
036}
